review: I love Amazon, but I wont say a peoduct is awesome if its not. Firetv stick is awesome! It's credibly easy to use, with a nice interface, I even think my parents could figure it out without calling me for tech support. The remote is just the right size. Remote buttons are well placed. I had no issues at all with install or use on 2 TVs in my house.  The 'help' videos are useful, there are a lot of features I had no idea firetv stick was capable of. Very cool product!!!
